title: BBC Local Live: Essex - BBC News
summary: men plead not guilty to football fan attack .

documents.title: monday 's weather : plenty of autumnal sunshine
text: after a chilly start , with some patchy mist and fog in places , there 'll be plenty of autumnal sunshine and lots of blue skies .
top temperature : 17c ( 63f ) .
it 'll be fairly clear overnight , but not quite so chilly , with lows of around 11c ( 52f ) .
get more on the forecast where you live , from bbc weather .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: mother begs bust harlow wedding shop to let brides 'have their dreams '
text: a mum has made a plea to a harlow wedding dress shop which has gone bust , to let customers `` have their dreams '' .
d & q weddings in harvey centre went into liquidation last week .
it 's not clear if women who 've bought dresses will get their outfits or their money back .
sheila o'sullivan 's daughter charlie is due to get married next year : `` chances are she wo n't get a penny of what she 's paid back .
i 'm disgusted , i feel ripped off and i 'm terribly disappointed for my daughter . ''
essex has tried to contact the company but has not yet had a response .

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: rise and shine essex , it 's time to start a new week here on essex live .
join us for live coverage until 18:00 for all the latest news , sport , weather and travel across the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch at any time , drop us an email or a tweet .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: updates for bbc essex live have now finished for the week - thanks for stopping by .
to recap , here are the top stories we 've covered :
we 're off to check behind our sofas for that missing lotto ticket - have a great weekend .

documents.title: weather : dry tonight but turning wet tomorrow
text: isolated showers this evening will fade away to leave much of the night dry with clear spells , and perhaps a few mist patches .
turning chilly with light winds , as temperatures fall to 6c ( 43f ) in prone rural spots .
sunny spells on saturday , particularly at first , but an increasing risk of showers or longer spells of rain developing , some heavy with hail and thunder , and perhaps some local flooding .
feeling notably cool with light and variable winds , and temperatures only reaching 16c ( 61f ) .
get your full local weekend forecast from bbc weather .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: search for unclaimed £ 8.1m lotto ticket
text: search for unclaimed £ 8.1m lotto ticket

documents.title: harlow music venue to close to make way for residential homes
text: a harlow music venue is to close and turned into residential properties after planning permission was granted on wednesday .
the square on fourth avenue will make way for 69 new flats and houses after an appeal by south anglia housing against harlow council 's decision on 13 january 2016 to refuse planning permission .
the government 's planning inspectorate has overturned that refusal .
councillor danny purton said he was `` disappointed '' at the `` loss of a popular music venue '' .

documents.title: colchester 's missing £ 8.1m lotto ticket
text: it was drawn on the day that saw team gb surpass their gold medal tally from london at the rio paralym - but are you the owner of colchester 's missing £ 8.1m winning lottery ticket ?

documents.title: britain should 'follow germany 's lead ' in migrant crisis , councillors claim
text: two southend councillors are calling on britain to be more like germany in our response to the european migrant crisis .
labour councillors cheryl nevin and julian ware-lane submitted a motion to southend borough council urging the government to allow unaccompanied children access to britain .
`` britain should be following germany 's lead , of accepting more than one million refugees last year , distributed across hundreds of cities and villages in the country , '' they said .

documents.title: brentwood diver dies off the cornwall coast
text: a man , who is believed to be from brentwood , has died following a diving accident off the coast of cornwall .
the 67-year-old was recovered unconscious from the water at porthkerris and airlifted to the royal cornwall hospital in truro , where he was later pronounced dead .
two other divers were taken to plymouth for specialist re-compression treatment after a rapid ascent in the sea on saturday .
a police spokesperson said inquiries were ongoing to establish the circumstances , but the death was not thought to be sus

documents.title: more details on those facing trial over football fan attack
text: we have more details on the men who appeared at basildon crown court today , after a football fan was left brain-damaged following an attack in southend last year .
twelve men , who were charged with violent disorder , pleaded not guilty .
they were :
a 13th man , ian young , 40 , of brightwell avenue , westcliff , who 's accused of assisting an offender and possessing a banned weapon has also denied the charges .
cambridge united fan simon dobbin , who lives in mildenhall in suffolk , is still receiving treatment for his injuries .
all of the defendants have been released on police bail and their trail is due to begin on 5 june .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex Political Producer

documents.title: university of essex releases statement over chakrabarti 's 'essex man ' comments
text: the university of essex says it `` appreciates upset caused '' after their chancellor made comments about not wanting to be left `` locked in a room with essex man '' .
baroness shami chakrabarti , who is also a labour peer , made the comments during the party 's conference earlier this week .
ukip mep tim aker has called for her resignation .

documents.title: body talk is coming your way # bbcbodytalk
text: in honour of women 's sport week ( 3-10 october ) , bbc get inspired and radio 1xtra have teamed up for an intimate and interactive discussion on body image issues for women in and around sport .
full details about how you can be there , get involved and watch it live can be found here .

documents.title: over 17,000 illegal cigarettes seized in southend shop raids
text: over 17,000 illegal cigarettes have been seized during raids on shops in southend , her majesty 's revenue and customs says .
during an operation on wednesday , eight shops were found to be selling tobacco , spirits and beer where it was suspected duty and vat had been evaded .
a 43-year-old woman from the town was arrested by hmrc on sus of the fraudulent evasion of excise duty .

documents.title: 'the real life forrest gump ' # getinspired
text: in the last year , ben smith has run over 10,000 miles across britain in all weather .
he is nearing the end of his challenge to run 401 marathons on consecutive days .
find out more about ben 's task with this video .

documents.title: weather : staying dry this afternoon
text: staying mostly dry for a large part of the day although scattered showers are likely to drift eastwards with the odd heavy burst .
showers may generally ease during the afternoon with more in the way of sunshine .
maximum temperature : 18c ( 64f ) .
popping out ?
get your local forecast from bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: 'faeces contamination ' closes southend swimming pool
text: just when you thought it was safe to go into the water , southend 's main swimming pool has been forced to close today after it was contaminated by faeces .
southend leisure tweeted that the pool , which usually opens to the public at 06:00 , would not reopen until 17:00 this afternoon .
customer notice the main swimming pool will be closed till 5pm due to contamination .
sorry for any inconvenience .
what sort of contamination ?
faeces contamination .
pool reopens at 5pm today .

documents.title: charlton loan muldoon to braintree
text: charlton loan muldoon to braintree

documents.title: it could be you £ 8.1m lotto prize unclaimed in colchester
text: live in colchester ?
you could be a multi-millionaire and not even know it .
that 's because a massive £ 8.1m winning lotto ticket has n't been claimed in the town , following the draw on 14 september .
the numbers on that date were 16 , 23 , 35 , 42 , 44 , 58 and the bonus ball was 28 .
if you 're desperately searching for a ticket which you thought was in your jeans , you have until 13 march 2017 to claim it .

documents.title: breakingmen plead not guilty to brain damage football fan attack
text: thirteen men charged in connection with an attack on a cambridge united football fan in southend last year have pleaded not guilty to their charges .
twelve of the defendants are accused of violent disorder and appeared at basildon crown court this morning .
another man has been charged with assisting an offender and possessing a banned weapon .
simon dobbin , 44 , who 's from midlenhall , was left with life-changing injuries following the attack outside a pub in east street in march 2015 .
a trial is now due to take place on 5 june 2017 .

documents.title: family left 'unnerved ' after car thefts
text: a benfleet family say they have been left unnerved after thieves stole two cars from their home on wednesday night .
it comes as essex police investigates 180 such crimes in the area .

documents.title: men due in court in connection with brain damage football fan attack
text: thirteen men are due to appear at basildon crown court this morning , charged in connection with an attack on a mildenhall man that left him needing round-the-clock care .
cambridge united supporter simon dobbin , 44 ( with his wife and daughter ) , had been watching his team at southend in march 2015 .
after the game he was attacked outside a pub on east street , and suffered a serious head injury .
the defendants have mainly been charged with violent disorder .

documents.title: 'unexpected ' blue mannequin : what do you make of it ?
text: yesterday , we published a photo of this artwork at the new john lewis store at chelmsford 's bond street shopping centre :
my first thoughts were lady gaga , but kim morris , head of store design at john lewis simply says : `` we want people to be excited when they come into our shops , we aim to surprise and delight .
`` that sometimes means doing something a little bit unexpected - like our blue mannequin .
`` we hope our customer love it as much as we do ! ''
do you ?
send us your thoughts via email , twitter or facebook .
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News

documents.title: southend car cruisers warned to stay away after injunction secured
text: car modification enthusiasts planning to attend an unauthorised cruising event in southend this weekend are being warned to stay away after an injunction was secured .
advertised on social media as the `` ultimate car meet '' , over 800 people were planning to attend the southend takeover on sunday night .
however , southend borough council announced an injunction obtained from the high court now forbids any such event until september 2017 .
councillor mark flewitt said : `` they have had over a year to talk to us and work with us to draw up plans to ensure a well-managed and safe event , but have chosen not to do that . ''

documents.title: police 'closing in ' on young gang responsible for basildon burglary spree
text: a senior essex police officer says he has a `` good idea '' about who has committed scores of recent burglaries in basildon .
the force is currently reviewing 180 such crimes , with many of those leading to the theft of cars from residents ' properties .
it 's believed those responsible are aged between 12 and 17 years old .
there have been mistakes made by the criminals , albeit in minute detail , but that detail is beginning to add up as a whole and i hope to put that to the suspects involved . ''

documents.title: video : chelmsford approves of new shopping centre
text: people in chelmsford have , on the whole , been reacting positively to the opening of the new £ 120m bond street shopping centre :
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

text: it 's the last day of september , and statistically it 's been a very warm month with lots of sunshine .
and there 's more sunshine today , although there 'll be heavy showers from late morning into the early afternoon .
temperatures reaching 18 ( c ) ( 64f ) .
